dataset_id: LBA-ECO LC-23 Vegetation Fire Data, Roraima , Brazil: 2003
title: LBA-ECO LC-23 Vegetation Fire Data, Roraima , Brazil: 2003
summary: This data set contains ASTER sensor Level-1B satellite imagery over controlled burns in the State of Roraima in Northern Brazil on January 19 and 28, 2003, plus simultaneously collected soil and near-surface air temperature profiles on January 28th. The ASTER imagery is provided in 14 zipped files containing HDF-EOS files (*.hdf and *.met file pairs), while the sample-based temperature profiles, one for the air the other for the ground, are provided as comma separated ASCII files.
